name: The Catnip Sniper (LD 40)
description:
VVVVV  How to Play  VVVVV

Move with WASD

Aim and shoot with the mouse

Run into doors to close them

 Throw the toy with right click

It will draw away the cats

Pick it back up by running into it

R to restart and Esc to quit

You only get points for crazy cats

Good Luck!

A game by Retrosaur for LD40:

"The more you have, the worse it is"

Here is the submission page!

All sound was done by  Terradox (Previously known as Clockwise 2000)

Here is the OST!

A special thanks to Travis for ideas and support
